languages.text: "Я не пойду против вашего подлого решения и приму его. Род Зауэрбэк никогда не давал повода усомниться в своей верности и лояльности, а потому я с гордостью принимаю смерть — она достойнее, чем служба кому-то вроде вас". {n}С вызовом Махарий вскидывает голову выше, и кажется, что теперь он смотрит на вас свысока.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я не пойду против вашего решения и приму его. Род Зауэрбек никогда не давал повод усомниться в своей верности и лояльности, а потому сейчас я с городостью принимаю смерть. Лучше погибнуть, чем служить бесчестному Вольному Торговцу". {n}C вызовом Махарий вскидывает голову выше, и кажется, что теперь он смотрит на вас свысока.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "I will not go against your despicable verdict. I will accept it. House Sauerback has never given you any reason to doubt our loyalty and, thus, I will accept death with pride, for there is more honour in that than in serving the likes of you." {n}He raises his chin defiantly, and it seems as if he is suddenly looking down on you from a great height.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я не пойду против вашего подлого решения и приму его. Род Зауэрбэк никогда не давал повода усомниться в своей верности и лояльности, а потому я с гордостью принимаю смерть — она достойнее, чем служба кому-то вроде вас". {n}С вызовом Махарий вскидывает голову выше, и кажется, что теперь он смотрит на вас свысока.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I will not go against your despicable verdict and will accept it. House Sauerback had never ever given any reason to doubt their loyalty, and thus I will accept death with dignity — it is more dignified than serving the likes of you." {n}He throws his head up, accepting his fate, and now it seems like he is looking down on you.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: "I will not go against your despicable verdict and will accept it. House Sauerback had never ever given any reason to doubt their loyalty, and thus I will accept death with dignity — it is more dignified than serving the likes of you." {n}He throws his head up, accepting his fate, and now it seems like he is looking down on you.{/n}

House Sauerback has never ever given any reason to doubt their loyalty and, thus, I will accept death with dignity, for it is more dignified than serving the likes of you." {n}He throws his head up, accepting his fate, and now it seems like he is looking down on you.{/n}

House Sauerback has never given you any reason to doubt our loyalty and, thus, I will accept death with pride, for there is more honour in that than in serving the likes of you." {n}He raises his chin defiantly, and it seems as if he is suddenly looking down on you from a great height.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: "I will not go against your despicable verdict. I will accept it. House Sauerback has never given you any reason to doubt our loyalty and, thus, I will accept death with pride, for there is more honour in that than in serving the likes of you." {n}He raises his chin defiantly, and it seems as if he is suddenly looking down on you from a great height.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: 「あなたの見下げ果てた判断に逆らうつもりはありません、ただ受け入れましょう。ザウアーバック家には、この忠誠心を疑われるような理由は断じてございません。ですから、私は誇りを持って死を受け入れます。あなたのような者に仕えるくらいなら、死の方が名誉というものでしょう」{n}彼は高みからあなたを見下ろすかのように、反抗的に顎を上げる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will not go against your despicable verdict. I will accept it. House Sauerback has never given you any reason to doubt our loyalty and, thus, I will accept death with pride, for there is more honour in that than in serving the likes of you." {n}He raises his chin defiantly, and it seems as if he is suddenly looking down on you from a great height.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの見下げ果てた判断に逆らうつもりはありません、ただ受け入れましょう。ザウアーバック家には、この忠誠心を疑われるような理由は断じてございません。ですから、私は誇りを持って死を受け入れます。あなたのような者に仕えるくらいなら、死の方が名誉というものでしょう」{n}彼は高みからあなたを見下ろすかのように、反抗的に顎を上げる。{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: “我不会反对这无耻的判决，我愿意顺服地接受。没有任何证据表明苏尔贝克家族曾对行商浪人不忠。因此，我宁愿带着高尚的尊严死去，也不愿意继续侍奉你这样的主人。”{n}马卡里乌斯挑衅般地扬起了下巴，目光中流露出居高临下的鄙夷之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will not go against your despicable verdict. I will accept it. House Sauerback has never given you any reason to doubt our loyalty and, thus, I will accept death with pride, for there is more honour in that than in serving the likes of you." {n}He raises his chin defiantly, and it seems as if he is suddenly looking down on you from a great height.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我不会反对这无耻的判决，我愿意顺服地接受。没有任何证据表明苏尔贝克家族曾对行商浪人不忠。因此，我宁愿带着高尚的尊严死去，也不愿意继续侍奉你这样的主人。”{n}马卡里乌斯挑衅般地扬起了下巴，目光中流露出居高临下的鄙夷之意。{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: « J'accepte votre verdict, aussi aberrant soit-il. La maison Sauerback n'a jamais fait quoi que ce soit qui puisse vous donner lieu de douter de sa loyauté, j'accepte donc la mort avec fierté, car il est plus digne de mourir que de vous servir. » {n}Il lève le menton d'un air rogue, comme si vous étiez un insecte qu'il toisait de ton son haut.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will not go against your despicable verdict. I will accept it. House Sauerback has never given you any reason to doubt our loyalty and, thus, I will accept death with pride, for there is more honour in that than in serving the likes of you." {n}He raises his chin defiantly, and it seems as if he is suddenly looking down on you from a great height.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'accepte votre verdict, aussi aberrant soit-il. La maison Sauerback n'a jamais fait quoi que ce soit qui puisse vous donner lieu de douter de sa loyauté, j'accepte donc la mort avec fierté, car il est plus digne de mourir que de vous servir. » {n}Il lève le menton d'un air rogue, comme si vous étiez un insecte qu'il toisait de ton son haut.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: «No me opondré a su deleznable veredicto. Lo acepto. La casa Sauerback nunca le ha dado motivos para dudar de nuestra lealtad y aceptaré nuestra muerte con orgullo, pues es más honrosa que servir a alguien como usted». {n}Levanta arrogantemente la barbilla, como si mirara desde las alturas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will not go against your despicable verdict. I will accept it. House Sauerback has never given you any reason to doubt our loyalty and, thus, I will accept death with pride, for there is more honour in that than in serving the likes of you." {n}He raises his chin defiantly, and it seems as if he is suddenly looking down on you from a great height.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No me opondré a su deleznable veredicto. Lo acepto. La casa Sauerback nunca le ha dado motivos para dudar de nuestra lealtad y aceptaré nuestra muerte con orgullo, pues es más honrosa que servir a alguien como usted». {n}Levanta arrogantemente la barbilla, como si mirara desde las alturas.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "Ich werde nicht gegen Euer abscheuliches Urteil protestieren. Ich werde es akzeptieren. Haus Sauerback hat Euch nie einen Anlass gegeben, an unserer Loyalität zu zweifeln, daher akzeptiere ich den Tod mit Stolz, weil er ehrenhafter ist, als Euresgleichen zu dienen." {n}Er hebt trotzig sein Kinn und scheint mit einem Mal aus großer Höhe auf dich herabzublicken.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will not go against your despicable verdict. I will accept it. House Sauerback has never given you any reason to doubt our loyalty and, thus, I will accept death with pride, for there is more honour in that than in serving the likes of you." {n}He raises his chin defiantly, and it seems as if he is suddenly looking down on you from a great height.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde nicht gegen Euer schändliches Urteil protestieren, sondern es akzeptieren. Haus Sauerback hat nie irgendeinen Anlass gegeben, an seiner Loyalität zu zweifeln, daher akzeptiere ich den Tod mit Würde — denn er ist würdevoller, als jemandem wie Euch zu dienen." {n}Mit hocherhobenem Kopf akzeptiert er sein Schicksal. Es sieht aus, als würde er auf dich hinabblicken.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "Bu rezil karara karşı konuşmayacağım bile. Sauerback Hanesi, size sadakatini sorgulatacak hiçbir sebep vermemiştir. Ölüm cezasını gururla karşılıyorum. Ölüp gitmek, size hizmet etmekten daha şereflidir." {n}Meydan okumak maksadıyla başını dikleştiren adam, âdeta seni hakir görüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will not go against your despicable verdict. I will accept it. House Sauerback has never given you any reason to doubt our loyalty and, thus, I will accept death with pride, for there is more honour in that than in serving the likes of you." {n}He raises his chin defiantly, and it seems as if he is suddenly looking down on you from a great height.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu rezil karara karşı konuşmayacağım bile. Sauerback Hanesi, size sadakatini sorgulatacak hiçbir sebep vermemiştir. Ölüm cezasını gururla karşılıyorum. Size hizmet etmektense ölü olmayı onurum için yeğlerim." {n}Meydan okumak maksadıyla başını dikleştiren adam, şimdi sana yüksek bir yerden bakıyor âdeta.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zaurback
